Class DigitalOceanMetadataConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.discovery.cloud.digitalocean.DigitalOceanMetadataConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Toggleable
@ConfigurationProperties("micronaut.application.digitalocean.metadata") @Requires(env="digitalocean") public class DigitalOceanMetadataConfiguration extends Object implements Toggleable
Default configuration for retrieving Digital Ocean metadata for ComputePlatform.DIGITAL_OCEAN.
Since:
1.1
Author:
Alvaro Sanchez-Mariscal
